title: AI Icon Generator
description: Icon generator using OpenAI API. Images are stored as binaries in an S3 Bucket. Integrated Stripe for payments.

title: Flashpic
description: Image sharing social media app. Created with React for the front-end and Sanity for easy content management.

title: Nova e-commerce
description: E-commerce app with Next.js + Sanity for content and Stripe for processing payments.

title: Trius e-commerce
description: One of my first apps created. E-commerce platform done using React for the front-end and Node + MongoDB for backend logic and database.
